channel.title: Windows on IT Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on IT Blog

item.title: Windows Tips
item.description: Setup Color management -> Advanced -> Display calibration -> Calibrate display. Change display settings -> Scale and layout -> Change the size of text, apps, and other items -> 200%. Taskbar settings -> Automatically hide the taskbar in desktop mode. Usage Remember to run GeForce Experience to update drivers from time to time. Open Add or remove programs to uninstall programs.

item.title: Windows Applications
item.description: Communication Slack Skype Ring Editors Sublime Text Atom Games Steam Uplay Windowed Borderless Gaming Cloud Storage Dropbox Yandex Disk Music Spotify Browsers Chrome Firefox Administration TeamViewer - the All-In-One Software for Remote Support and Online Meetings. Paid 1Password - 3$/month Adobe Photoshop CC - 10$/month
